text: Isipɨn Atrivim Neko, Joahasɨn atrivir ingangarim agɨfa, egha a isa Riplan nguibar ekiamɨn kalabus gatɨ, an Hamatɨn kantrin aven itir nguibam. Ezɨ Joahas Jerusalemɨn aven uam atrivimɨn itir puvatɨ. Ezɨ Atrivim Neko Judan kantrin gumazamizibagh amima, me takisɨn mɨn dagɨaba a ganɨdi, dar dɨbobonim, 3,400 kilogrem silva ko 34 kilogrem gol.
